Posts.Content: Oct 30, 2016 08:08AM Hkuester wrote: I had my bilateral September 26. Still sore and get worn out easily. My doctor said 6 weeks before any vacuuming or lifting more than 10 pounds. I started chemo 2 weeks ago to so I'm blaming some of my issues from that too. I think it takes time. Lately finding anyway to sleep that's comfortable seems Impossible!
Posts.Title: 4 weeks out and still sore. Anyone else? Theresef ravzari
